text: 11.9 2 Ko 12.13, Plp 4.15-18, 1 Te 2.9 Nɨb ayɨp yenek ñɨn ak, yɨp tap olap tek dek, yad pen bɨ nɨbop olap mani tap okok yɨp ñaŋ agɨl ma agnɨgɨnek. Mel. Klays binɨb ne Masedoniya plopens nɨb owlak okok nep, tap tay yɨp tek dak okok dap ñɨlak. Tap nɨbop olap dɨnɨg nebneb ma agɨnek, kɨdek abe tap nɨbop ogɨnap ma agnɨgɨnɨgayn.
